name_ru: День Святого Валентина — Сердечки из лент под глазами
name_ka: ვალენტინობა — წითელი ლენტის გულები თვალის ქვეშ
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial skin retouch. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical. Eyelashes: absolutely protected — pixel-identical, no interaction. Eyes, eyelids, eyebrows: no modification. Lip color: unchanged. SKIN: Professional retouch — smooth, radiant, healthy glow. Remove minor blemishes. Preserve natural texture, pores, micro-details. Hydrated editorial highlights. Add large freckles across face — delicate, natural, photorealistic. ADD: Thin red satin ribbons placed under eyes, folded in the shape of hearts — elegant, realistic fabric texture with proper light reflection. BACKGROUND: Solid dark red. QUALITY: No filters, no smoothing. Ultra-photorealistic editorial beauty. 8K quality. Original dimensions.
